feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: Fathom, foreseeing that the affair might be managed for his own interest, professed himself of the baronet’s opinion; and, without hesitation, undertook the office of a mediator.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: The count was so much enraged at these sarcastic observations, that his faculty of speech was overwhelmed by his resentment.

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: The German, enraged at this comparison, was quite abandoned by his patience and discretion.

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: Having received the Englishman’s acknowledgments for this instance of friendship, he forthwith set out for the place of the German’s habitation.

Places.name: Lodgings
Places.description: Accommodation in the Fauxbourg de St. Germain

Places.name: Hotel
Places.description: Reputable place frequented by fashionable strangers
